lines.gurmukhi: kotn kotwin suK pujY n smwin suK AwnMd kotwin qul AwnMd n AwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kotan Kotaani Soukh Pujai N Samaani Soukha , Aanand Kotaani Tul Aanand N Aavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of comforts and millions of ecstasies cannot reach anywhere near the comforts and ecstasies that are experienced with His acquisition.

lines.gurmukhi: shij kotwin koit pujY n shj sr mMgl kotwin sm mMgl n pwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaji Kotaani Koti Pujai N Sahaj Sara , Mangal Kotaani Sam Mangal N Paavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of equipoise states cannot reach the state of His stability, nor can millions of happy songs of praise can touch the bliss of the happiness blessed by Him.

lines.gurmukhi: kotn kotwn prqwp n pRqwp sr kotn kotwn Cib Cib n pujwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Kotan Kotaan Parataap N Prataap Sara , Kotan Kotaan Chhabi Chhabi N Pujaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of splendours cannot match His splendour nor can millions of adornments reach His form.

lines.gurmukhi: ArQ Drm kwm moK kotin hI sm nwih Aausr ABIc nwh ishj bulwvhI ]651]
lines.transliteration_english: Arad Dharam Kaam Mokh Kotani Hee Sam Naahi , Aousar Abheech Naah Sihaj Bulaavahee ?651?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of four desirable elements (dharam, arth, kaam and mokh) cannot reach him who has been blessed with His Naam and who gets an opportunity of the auspicious invitation of the Master calling the seeker on the nuptial bed of His heart.  (651)
